sub_title: Lecturer at Fontys University, International Communications Management / VITALEYES Coach for Natural Eyesight Improvement
summary:
An enthusiastic person by nature who enjoys living in different countries and delving deep into the rainbow spectrum of various cultures. Currently, working as an energetic lecturer and experienced coach at Fontys University, international Communication Management while teaching Natural Eyesight Improvement, yoga and meditation.  

COMPETENCES
•	Skills in creative writing, spokesperson, curriculum/didactic development
•	Colorful developer of ideas & content
•	Recognize and utilize synergistic opportunities	
•	Successfully adapt to communicate across various cultures
•	Effectively initiate and execute events on a global level
•	Detailed, enthusiastic, patient
•	Influence and motivate students, employees and stakeholders


Natural Eyesight Improvement Coach 

Successful in helping people to improve their eyesight using natural and holistic methods. Offering (non-medical) innovative educational workshops to help people improve farsighted and nearsighted vision to see more clearly without (reading) glasses, contact lenses. and after Lasik surgery. Also, teach prevention workshops to maintain clear vision. A highly motivated educator bringing enthusiasm and action into the learning atmosphere. 

Communications & Event management professional

Accomplished communications professional able to conceptualize and execute interactive events that increase local and global employee engagement. Skilled in facilitating and sustaining momentum of employee engagement and long-term champions for global internal employee programs through educational tools and events. Experienced in creating consistent communication and growing the branding of strategic partnerships. Strength in building committed relations with a cross-section of stakeholders leading to synergistic opportunities that enhance the efficiency of resources, time and costs. Multicultural background from living in the Netherlands, Ukraine, U.S., Japan and Korea.

treasury_media.description: The Art of Living proudly presents.. Peace Culture Festival (PCF) - The most happening event of the year in Eindhoven, will bring waves of happiness, peace a...

treasury_media.title: Peace Culture Festival begin van Internationale Vredesweek Eindhoven
treasury_media.description:
Newspaper article on the Peace Culture Festival where I played a key role in the ideation and role out of the first signature event of the Peace Culture Festival.

EINDHOVEN - Het Peace Culture Festival (PCF) op 17 september in het Klokgebouw is het Eindhovense startschot van de Internationale Vredesweek. Naast veel muziek, cultuur en andere activiteiten staat vrede er centraal.

profile_positions.title: Lecturer and Coach for the International Communications Management Programme

profile_positions.description:
•	Creative and fun curriculum to improve your eyesight holistically and naturally
•	Taught natural eyesight Improvement lessons privately and at educational 
institutes with 99% positive client feedback 
•	Previous contractual training positions in the U.S.:   Cerritos College Continuing Education,
Menifee College Continuing Education, Lake Elsinore Senior Activity Center
profile_positions.title: Natural Eyesight Improvement (NEI) Trainer

profile_positions.description:
•	Ensure that all operations function in a correct, cost effective and timely manner in alignment with company policies & procedures, specifications and quality requirements
•	Improve operational management systems, processes and best practices that guarantee organizational well-being
•	Manage, train & coach a team of 20 people in the cashier and warehouse department (emphasis on self development and work happiness)
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
From ideation to implementation managed the first annual Eindhoven signature event - Peace Culture Festival (PCF) at the Klokgebouw. Built from a zero stakeholder base, a strong balanced network for the 2017 and future PCFs.  Successful grant writing for the festival's budget, trust building, promoting and managing core team were key tasks, which resulted in over 1400 visitors (1000 was the target) who stayed an average of 4 hours  at the event; collection of over 800 email addresses for follow-up actions; 90-100% participation at the festival's workshops and panel discussion.

Eindhoven Dagblad: Peace Culture Festival article: http://bit.ly/2z63UkY 
Video Festival Trailer: https://youtu.be/9KmRvp5PUwI
Festival After Movie: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1HRYaug-1z00mm7LSdED92tOoLqjQ-vgo
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/events/310540716035136/
Peace Culture Festival website: http://e.artofliving.org/peace-culture-festival

profile_positions.description:
•	Planned and managed worldwide employee events that included 2 DSM engagement events per year for strategic partner, the United Nations World Food Programme (WFP). Measured results: increased internal engagement growth toward the partnership from 14 to 17 countries and 19 to 45 DSM participating sites within 2 years.  Global employee donations increased over 100% in 1 year. 80% of the global business units actively participated in the events
•	Created and globally coordinated the WFP-DSM regional coordinator program (NL, Europe, Asia, USA, LA, Africa) to facilitate long-term champions.  Program included training 10 regional coordinators to increase awareness of DSM-WFP partnership and employee engagement 
•	Wrote corporate internal communication to educate and grow awareness of the DSM-WFP Partnership activities (newsletters, DSM Facebook, Netpresenter messages) 
•	Implemented local DSM-WFP employee engagement activities (guest speakers, WFP cookbook sales)
•	Bulked and solidified the established global employee network for the DSM-WFP Partnership (increased membership of the Friends of WFP by 30% per year)
•	Coordinated the creation of an educational board game, Barisol, to teach people to work together to end hunger
•	Mentored International High School students in projects related to the WFP-DSM Partnership 
•	Voiceovers for DSMtv productions
